text: Fuzzy's Taco Shop is an American fast casual restaurant chain specializing in Baja-style Mexican cuisine. In August 2021, it had 150 locations in 18 states. It was founded in 2001 by Paul Willis. In December 2022, the chain was acquired by Dine Brands Global. == References == Category:American restaurants Category:2001 establishments in the United States
title: Fuzzy's Taco Shop
